boardgame.name: La banda dei pinguini
Manchots Barjots
Pingvasion
Szeregowy Pingwin
Zany Penguins
爆走企鵝
boardgame.description: In Zany Penguins, you want to make sure that your tribe of penguins is the one that takes control of the Earth, so do what you can to take charge of regions such as the desert, jungle, and the North Pole._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In game terms, each region has a set of cards numbered 1-9. To set up, shuffle the deck, then deal each player a personal deck of 18 cards. Each player starts with two cards in hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On a turn, you draw two cards, pass one card each to your left- and right-hand neighbors, take the cards passed to you, then simultaneously play and reveal one card in front of you on the table. If you play a 1, on your next turn you play and reveal two cards instead of one; if you play a 2, it blows up all 6-9 cards played that same turn; and if you play a 3, on the subsequent turn everyone else plays before you do._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After eight turns, for each card color on the table in front of you in which you have the highest sum of all players, you score the sum of all cards of this color in your hand. For each color in which you don't have the highest sum, you score the single lowest card of this color in your hand. Players tally their scores, and whoever has the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #17: Play ball! Baseball Highlights 2045, Bottom of the 9th; WWE Superstar Showdown on tap
Episode 43: Zany Penguins, Medici: The Card Game, Animals on Board, Oaxaca, Mystery Rummy: Jack the Ripper
Episode 55 - Interview with Stonemaier Games Jamey Stegmaier
Game of the Month March 2016 with the Game Boy Geek

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Game: Pingvasion Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: German Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 spieleberatung@t-online.de
